thread.title: Inventor Develops Improved Rod-and-Reel Design (LAN-131)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Develops Improved Rod-and-Reel Design (LAN-131)

author: Chrissa Chverchko
title: Inventor Develops Improved Rod-and-Reel Design (LAN-131)
text:
"I did not want to have to lug around a bunch of rods and reels to and from my fishing spot," said an inventor from Harrisburg, Pa. "I know that other fishermen feel the same. This inspired me to develop a more convenient, compact, space-saving solution." He created a prototype for the REEL MC COY to make it easier to switch between various reels. The unit eliminates the need to carry several rods and reels to and from the fishing spot. It features a space-saving design. The accessory makes fishing less stressful and more enjoyable. Additionally, it does not require the use of tools.
 Lancaster LAN-131,
